traits.name: Stabby Frenzy
entries: When the stabby-stabber hits with a melee attack, it can attack again and continue making additional attacks until it misses. The stabby-stabber cannot move between the attacks made with this trait.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
